<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Perguntas adicionais dos Candidatos">143e0e0d4770021008334d05516d437c</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:0b301e8d4770021008334d05516d435c</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Preencher Dados do usuário</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

			//Busca dados
		var ga = new GlideAjax('HandleCandidatos');
		ga.addParam('sysparm_name','Search');
		ga.addParam('sysparm_key', key); 
		ga.getXML(getAnswer);  /* Call HelloWorld.helloWorld() with the parameter sysparm_user_name set to 'Bob' 
      and use the callback function HelloWorldParse() to return the result when ready */

		// the callback function for returning the result from the server-side code
		function getAnswer(response) {  
			var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer"); 
				
				answer = JSON.parse(answer);
				alert(answer);
		}
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-11 17:48:52</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>04403bba977c8e105e9fb680f053af84</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Preencher Dados do usuário</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Case Banco Brasil Tecnologia" source="x_1174267_case_b_0">c1eb252c4704021008334d05516d4344</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Case Banco Brasil Tecnologia">c1eb252c4704021008334d05516d4344</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_04403bba977c8e105e9fb680f053af84</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-11 17:49:01</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
